stripped_text: +3 mu Use the MU on Knobkierie only for virus programs. The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may place 1 virus counter on an installed virus program. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +3[mu] Use the MU on Knobkierie only for virus programs. The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may place 1 virus counter on an installed virus program. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Knobkierie
